TrainingCourseParticipant.name: TrainingCourseParticipant
TrainingCourseParticipant.description: Represents the trainings completed by a person.

ContactId.description: ID of the contact record of the individual taking the training.

InstituitionName.description: Name of the institution offereing the training.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the training course participant.

StartDate.description: The start date of the participant's training.

TotalCredits.description: The total training credits the participant earned.

TotalHours.description: The total hours the participant spent in the training course.

VerificationDate.description: The date when the training participation was verified.

VerificationStatus.description: Specifies the status of the training participation verification.
